subject_id.Description: Subject ID from BIDS naming (e.g., sub-01)

session_id.Description: Session ID if multi-session dataset, else 'n/a'

output_num.Description: Number of output files for this subject/session

output_size.Description: Total size of output files for this subject/session

html_num.Description: Number of HTML report files for this subject/session

nifti_num.Description: Number of NIfTI output files for this subject/session

nifti_size.Description: Total size of NIfTI output files for this subject/session
